casebody.data:
PROTECTING MICHIGAN TAXPAYERS, Jeffrey Wiggins, Tony Daunt, and Jeffrey Razet, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
BOARD OF STATE CANVASSERS, Director of Elections, and Secretary of State, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Protect Michigan Jobs, Intervenor-Appellant. SC: 157761
COA: 343566 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 15, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motions for immediate consideration and to stay the effect of the Court of Appeals decision are GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the May 11, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals remains pending.
